pages.text: Mining and foresting is all well and good for those who refuse to dream big, but what self-respecting sanguimancer would ever stoop to that? $(br2)With this in mind, you have devised some devious little devices. Simply throw them at some pesky trees, rocks, or whatever else you wish to cease to be and wait for them to self-ignite.

Not only that, you can improve their functionality by $(item)Anointing$() them with certain ingredients and a little $(raw)Will$(), as described after each entry. $(br2)The currently avaliable anointments are as follows: $(li)Fortunate - broken blocks are affected by $(item)Fortune I$(). $(li)Heated Tool - Broken blocks are $(item)Smelted$(). $(li)Soft Touch - Broken blocks are affected by $(item)Silk Touch$().

pages.heading: 聚能炸藥
pages.text: $(item)聚能炸藥$() 將摧毀一個 5x5x5 的立方體，作用方向為它放置的方塊的那一側，就像用鎬開採一樣掉落所有方塊。 它甚至適用於黑曜石，而且在這樣做的同時提供了最令人滿意的 $(o)KABOOM$()。

pages.heading: 伐林炸藥
pages.text:
$(item)伐木炸藥$() 用於砍伐樹木。
它可以放在原木或樹葉上，除非是超大的樹，不然可以一次砍倒整棵，
可以一次採集$(item)2組$() 原木（並整齊地剝去它在此過程中遇到的任何樹葉！）即使是叢林巨木也會在幾秒鐘內倒下。

pages.heading: 可控炸藥
pages.text:
$(item)可控炸藥$()，只破壞$(underline)與它附著的該種方塊$()。
從附著點開始，它可以一次挖掘$(item)約三組的方塊$()。
像其他炸藥一樣，所有被挖掘的方塊將掉落。

pages.heading: 菌菇炸藥
pages.text:
$(item)菌菇炸藥$() 用於砍伐主世界和地獄的巨型蘑菇。 
雖說一次爆炸能否達到目的還有待商榷，但它可以破壞約$(item) 三組的方塊$() 。
